code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";import{watchUserSignIn}from"../saga";import rootReducer from"../reducers";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware)));sagaMiddleware.run(watchUserSignIn);export default store;
